result.execSummary:
The defendant Treondus R Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant is to provide a DNA sample. Court ordered the defendant to pay all costs, fees and assessments including the DNA surcharge by 9-22-15. Failure to pay will result in the defendant serving 10 days in the House of Correction straight time.
Consecutive to: to any sentence. Huber privileges only if employed. Sentence to commence forthwith. Credit for 3 days time served.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Treondus R Robinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Commitment paid in full by Sheriff Check
F&C Commitment issued for failure to pay.  10 days HOC, Straight Time.  Due & owing

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Zachary A. Wittchow appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy Court Clerk:  ss

  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

  Court sentenced defendant to serve 120 days in the House of Correction CONSECUTIVE to any sentence with credit for 3 days served; Huber privileges only if employed.  Sentence to commence  forthwith.

Court ordered the defendant to pay all costs, fees and assessments including the DNA surcharge by 09-22-15.  Failure to pay will result in the defendant serving 10 days in the House of Correction straight time.

Defendant is to provide a DNA sample

Appeal rights given
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and filed due to missed telephone contact.  aw
Sentencing hearing scheduled for 09-22-2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Antonella Aleman appearing for Stephan Nolten, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant sworn as to his statements.

Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of GUILTY and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty as charged in the Information/Complaint and enters a judgment of conviction.

Court orders case adjourned for sentencing in Branch 3.  No PSI ordered.
Clerk:  jms
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Stephan Nolten.
State is not approving a DPA.  Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 6/27/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.  aw

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen A Sargent.  Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Stephan Nolten.
Defense has just been notified that a DPA will not be offered in this case.  Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 5/5/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 5, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Stephan Eduard Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court is in trial.  Defendant needs to talk with ADA Glamm to see if defendant can get a DPA.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 4/28/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3. Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Stephan Eduard Nolten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel needs time to talk with client.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 4/7/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court ordered all motions be filed by the next court date. Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Dennis P. Murphy, appearing for Stephan Nolten, appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 3.

Court reviews JusticePoint report with defendant; defendant is advised to continue cooperating with JusticePoint as a condition of bail.
Clerk:  jms

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
   No use or possession of illegal or controlled substances without a valid prescription.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Treondus R Robinson in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Treondus R Robinson in custody.  Carole R. Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 12, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
